# SportBot AI

> AI-Powered Sports Analytics Platform - Find where the market is wrong

SportBot AI is an educational sports analytics platform that provides AI-driven match analysis with probability estimates, value detection, and risk assessment. We help users understand sports matches better through data-driven insights.

## About

SportBot AI analyzes sports matches using artificial intelligence to provide:
- Match probability estimates
- Value detection and odds analysis
- Risk assessment
- Team form analysis
- Head-to-head statistics
- Key player impact analysis
- Weather and venue considerations

We cover multiple sports including Soccer, Basketball (NBA), American Football (NFL), Tennis, Ice Hockey (NHL), Baseball (MLB), and more.

**Important**: This is an educational/analytical tool for understanding sports matches. We sell understanding, not predictions.

## Main Pages

- [Home](https://www.sportbotai.com/): Main landing page with live match analysis
- [Analyzer](https://www.sportbotai.com/analyzer): Free AI-powered match analysis tool
- [Matches](https://www.sportbotai.com/matches): Browse upcoming matches across all sports
- [Blog](https://www.sportbotai.com/blog): Sports analytics articles and insights
- [Pricing](https://www.sportbotai.com/pricing): Subscription plans (Free, Pro, Premium)

## Features

### Free Tier
- 3 match analyses per day
- Basic probability estimates
- Team form analysis
- H2H statistics

### Pro Tier ($9.99/month)
- 15 analyses per day
- Advanced analytics
- Value detection
- Prediction history

### Premium Tier ($19.99/month)
- Unlimited analyses
- AI Sports Desk chat
- Market alerts
- Priority support

## API Access

SportBot AI does not currently offer public API access. All analytics are available through our web platform.
